channel.title: How do i make a shop use donator points instead of gp
channel.description:
any ideas the server already has a donator shop and has donator status and donator points i just dont know how to make the shop use the donator points or make the items price as donator points
thanks for looking

item.title: How do i make a shop use donator points instead of gp
item.dc:creator: @qtst35 qtst35
item.description:
@qtst35 wrote:

thank you for ur help ill take a look can i ask where abouts that could be located on a PI.

please release if it will help people but put at the bottom if you are not prepared to answer lodes of questtions

sorry if this didnt help please dont ask questions

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a shop use donator points instead of gp

item.title: How do i make a shop use donator points instead of gp
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

So… I wrote a system like a year ago to allow for different currencies to be implemented into the Shops Configuration. Should I just go ahead and release this now? I see threads like this all the time. The only reason I don’t want to release it is because so many people will have problems converting it for their source.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a shop use donator points instead of gp

item.title: How do i make a shop use donator points instead of gp
item.dc:creator: @Repu Repu
item.description:
@Repu wrote:

As halflife has suggested, look around your buyitem method for where the GP is deducted and then you can do something like:-

if (shopId == 69) { //reduct the points } //reduce coins }

Read full topic
